ygData.subject: RE: Surfing gone
ygData.msgSnippet: cool you got your evensong, grats.  by the way i saw many items for bards in PoS, through quests.  probably won t get any too soon at level 50 tho, but the one
ygData.messageBody:
cool you got your evensong, grats. by the way i saw many items for bards in
PoS, through quests. probably won't get any too soon at level 50 tho, but
the one that caught my eye was "harmonic spear." no joke. now i KNOW you
can't wait to wield that baby.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L37 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


> Plane of Sky is a flop. They are going too far with this
> monkey sink
> bs. Time to go beat up some ice giants now for the cash to hit the
> plane so I can die to find out what goodies are up there, if any.
>
> Harmonic.
